https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/39lGRmWfWIXbPrLudeqJGBDhwa9.jpg Jérôme and Cédric play basketball in the same team at school and are best friends. Jérôme also gives Cédric some private math lessons. During one of those sessions, Cédric's action will be interpreted by both young men in a different way. Basketball and Mathematics
